author: metachris_
content:
Quick update on our Flashbots Sepolia mev-boost relay upgrade

- all the parts of our stack upgraded fine (no issues in the code were found) ðŸŽ‰ 
- due to a geth configuration error our builder didn't sync and we didn't deliver blocks until earlier today (it was fixed simply by using the correct `--override.shanghai` flag) ðŸª²
